attributes.action: A deduction in tuition fees for university students until online teaching ends
attributes.additional_details: It is unfair to expect the same work standard let alone the same tuition fees for such a disruptive year. How can you expext us to pay £9,250 a year for online videos. University students have been neglected and blame has been shifted on to them throughout this pandemic, not to mention the effects on their mental health. We are now asking you to reduce the tuition fees until online teaching ends.
attributes.background: With the new lockdown being announced it means for most university students teaching will now be/ continue to be online. The Government should give all university students a reduction in tuition fees as online teaching is not worth £9,250 a year.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Lower university tuition fees for students until online teaching ends
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552911

Government subsidise this year's university tuition fees
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552814

Require universities to partially refund tuition fees for 20/21 due to Covid-19
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/324762
